question: Article 3 of the Indian Constitution authorises Parliament to?
option1: Increase the area of any state
option2: Diminish the area of any state
option3: Alter the boundaries of any state
explanation:
Article 3 of the Indian Constitution authorises Parliament to-
1. increase the area of any state
2. diminish the area of any state
3. alter the boundaries of any state
4. alter the name of any state
